item.title: Jogging thoughts
item.description: Running is just controlling after fall What? Why? Today i was running my short 4km cycle. Sometimes while i am running i catch my self how i check and analyse my running technique. Some thoughts today keep an upright running position (make yourself big) hold hands loosely with elbows flexed (triangle) minimize braking forces during foot strike spend some power in hopping (vertical force) try to run light-footed Just start running and do not change (intensity and volume) until you are able to run 45min with a stable heart rate pattern
